plot: Irene and Leonidas have been married for three years but they do not have any children because of Irene's gynecologic problem. One day Irene becomes pregnant. A test discloses that the baby has Down syndrome.
title: An m'agapas
plot_es: Irene and Leonidas have been married for three years but they do not have any children because of Irene's gynecologic problem. One day Irene becomes pregnant. A test discloses that the baby has Down syndrome.
